org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops.impl.accum.distances

Class CosineSimilarity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops.BaseOp
      • org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops.BaseAccumulation
        • org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops.impl.accum.distances.CosineSimilarity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Accumulation, Op

    public class CosineSimilarity
extends BaseAccumulation
    Cosine similarity Note that you need to initialize a scaling constant equal to the norm2 of the vector
